thread.title: Kylie Jenner's BFF Pia Mia lands in London looking effortlessly cool!
thread.title_full: Kylie Jenner's BFF Pia Mia lands in London looking effortlessly cool!

title: Kylie Jenner's BFF Pia Mia lands in London looking effortlessly cool!
text:
Kylie Jenner's BFF Pia Mia lands in London looking effortlessly cool! Published Friday, Oct 23 2015, 16:45 BST | By Jacqueline Kilikita | Sassy songstress Pia Mia showed the UK exactly how to nail L.A cool when she arrived for an interview at BBC Radio 1 HQ earlier today looking too stylish for words. Well almost. 
© WENN / Mario Mitsis 
© WENN / Mario Mitsis Pia who collaborated with rapper Tyga on hit track Do It Again proved that sweats are in fact a seriously stylish sartorial choice as she stepped out in this slouchy grey hoodie that featured a cute rollneck and oversized sleeves. What we're just a tiny bit unsure about however, is the way the blonde beauty wore her checkered shirt as skirt by tying it loosely around her waist to reveal her enviably slender and incredibly bronzed legs. We admire her individuality! Pia Mia who often makes an appearance in Keeping up with The Kardashians star Kylie Jenner's Snapchat stories gave us all a mega case of hair envy with her flowing, lustrous blonde lengths that were tousled at the ends. The star also channelled her inner boho chick with a 'hun' (half bun, dontcha know) and went all Tupac on us with a red paisley bandana that kept her fringe off of her perfectly made up face. A poppy-red lip, a pair of space-age silver boots and thick grey socks to keep of the British chill was all Pia Mia needed to complete her street-chic look, placing her firmly on the fashion radar as one to watch out for.Oh, we're just a little bit obsessed with her...
